RecordStatus - Enum in model
To specify download status: created, started, paused, finished and skipped.

RequestManager - Class in communication.management

RESTful - Class in model
The RESTful class is a abstract class that represents the structure of ESGF RESTful API.

The RESTfulSearch class extends RESTful, to implement search functionality.
